title: Shah Rukh Khan Requests Amitabh Bachchan To Visit AbRam On Saturdays Because He Thinks He’s His Grandfather
description: After seeing the lovely bond between Amitabh Bachchan and AbRam, Shah Rukh Khan couldn’t resist to request him to visit AbRam to perhaps play with him. “Sir aayaa karo na,” he wrote to him and won our hearts. Shah Rukh Khan’s little one – AbRam – is so innocent that he thinks Amitabh Bachchan is his grandfather.
